resources.string: The Justice League, also known as the Justice League of America, is a fictional team of superheroes originating in comic books published by the American publisher DC Comics. The team is a group of superheroes, usually made up of seven characters, also known as the Magnificent Seven.
Avengers or The Avengers are a group of comic book superheroes published in the United States by Marvel Comics. The group also appears in Marvel adaptations for cinema, cartoons and video games.
